embeds.title: Eve Echoes Verification
embeds.description:
In order to verify your Eve Echoes identity, you will be asked to upload a screenshot of your character sheet from in game, or paste a link to it when prompted. Please be prepared to do this as you will have only 60 seconds from the time you start verification.

**Guidelines**
a. Upload or link only one screenshot when asked.
b. Do not edit the screenshot in any way.
c. If you are using an emulator, crop the image to contain only the game, not the emulator window or your full desktop.

**Example Screenshot required for verification**

embeds.title: Privacy Notice
embeds.description:
By completing the verification process your provided screenshot will be stored along with your character name. This information will be associated with your Discord ID and Server on which you've verified. 

You may view your verification details at any time by using the command **myverification**

If you wish to delete your verification data on a specific Discord server use the command **deleteverification** on that server.

If you wish to delete your verification data across all Discord servers send the command **deleteverificaiton** in a direct message to this bot.

embeds.title: Begin Verification
embeds.description:
If your are ready to begin verification, please type the command 
**verifynow**
